emailTemplate

Summary
Email templates are used to automatically compose standard emails. Templates support basic formattings (e.g.: bold, italics) and allow for a number of predefined variables which are automatically substituted when the real email is subsequent created. Email templates can be defined for different domain subjects such as Job, or Visit; and the specific variables that are available vary depending on the subject.
